name: Pinball Heroes: Complete
description:
Pinball Heroes™: Complete is now available for the PlayStation®Vita system! The classic PSP® game has been remade with the PS Vita systems’s features in mind and includes all 8 action-packed tables from the original version, as well as a slew of new online and social features so you can show the world your pinball prowess by competing with friends.

Includes: UNCHARTED: Drake’s Fortune™, Pain™, High Velocity Bowling™, Hot Shots Golf™, ModNation™Racers, Fat Princess, wipEout™ HD, and Motorstorm™

New Features
• Compete with friends in new online modes including Leaderboard Challenge, Online Versus, and Online Tournaments
• Real time head-to-head competition
• Share scores via Facebook or Twitter
• Full trophy support
• Added touch controls

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1 player(s)
100KB Minimum

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.
